Items.Title: Roll Call
Invocation
Items.AgendaNote:
Delivered by: Imam Souleimane Konate, Council of African Imams in America Inc., 23 East 115th Street, New York N.Y. 10029.

Motion to spread the invocation in full upon the record by Council Member Dickens .
Items.MinutesNote:
The Invocation was delivered by: Imam Souleimane Konate, Council of African Imams in America Inc., 23 East 115th Street, New York, N.Y. 10029.

Council Member Dickens moved to spread the Invocation in full upon the Record.

Items.Title: Adoption of Minutes
Items.AgendaNote: Motion that the Minutes of the Stated Meeting of August 18, 2016 be adopted as printed by Council Member Crowley.
Items.MinutesNote: Council Member Crowley moved that the Minutes of the Stated Meeting of August 16, 2016 be adopted as printed.

Items.Title: Messages & Papers from the Mayor
Communications from City, County & Borough Offices
Petitions and Communications
Land Use Call-Ups

By Council Member Koo:
Pursuant to Rule 11.20.b of the Council and Section 197-d (b)(3) of the New York City Charter, the Council hereby resolves that the action of the City Planning Commission on Uniform Land Use Review Procedure Application No. C 160247 PQQ shall be subject to Council review.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Call-Up be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Landmarks, 31-32 Union Street, Queens (C160247 PQQ)

Items.Title:
By Council Member Richards:
Pursuant to Rule 11.20.b of the Council and Section 197-d (b)(3) of the New York City Charter, the Council hereby resolves that the action of the City Planning Commission on Uniform Land Use Review Procedure Application No. C 160248 PQQ shall be subject to Council review.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Call-Up be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Landmarks, 144-20 243rd Street, Queens (C160248 PQQ)

Items.Title: Resolution condemning all efforts to delegitimize the State of Israel and the global movement to boycott, divest from, and sanction the people of Israel.
Items.AgendaNote: Amended and Adopted by the Committee on Contracts
Items.MinutesNote:
Pursuant to Rule 8.50 of the Council, the Public Advocate (Ms. James) called for a voice vote.  Hearing those in favor, the Public Advocate (Ms. James) declared the Resolution to be adopted.

The following 4 Council Members formally noted their oposition to the passage of this item:
Council Members Barron, Mendez, Menchaca and Miller.

The following 6 Council Members formally noted their abstention to vote on this item:
Council Members Cumbo, Dromm, Reynoso, Rose, Williams and Wills.

Adopted by the Council by voice-vote.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by voice vote.
Items.MatterName: Condemning all efforts to delegitimize the State of Israel and the global movement to boycott, divest from, and sanction the people of Israel.

Items.MatterName: Planning, LA CENTRAL, Bronx (N 160269 ZRX)

Items.Title: Application No. C 160268 HAX submitted by the Department of Housing Preservation and Development, pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law and Section 197-c of the New York City Charter for the designation of as an urban development action area, approval of an urban development action area project, and disposition of City property; for properties located at Bergen Avenue and Westchester Avenue (Block 2361, Lots 1, 25, 26 and 50 and Block 2294, Lot 32), and 503 East 153 Street (Block 2363, Lot 1) Borough of the Bronx, Community Board 1, Council District 17.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Planning, LA CENTRAL, Bronx (C 160268 HAX)

Items.Title: Application No. C 160270 ZSX submitted by Department of Housing Preservation and Development pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for the grant of special permits pursuant to the sections 74-743(a)(1) and n 74-743(a)(2) to waive open space, yard, and height and setback regulations for a proposed mixed-use development, on property generally bounded by Bergen Avenue and its northeasterly centerline prolongation, Brook Avenue and East 149th Street Borough of the Bronx, Community Board 1, Council District 17. This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to Charter Section 197-d(b)(2) or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to Charter Section 197-d(b)(3).
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Planning, LA CENTRAL, Bronx (C 160270 ZSX)

Items.Title: Application No. C 160271 ZSX submitted by Department of Housing Preservation and Development pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for the grant of a special permit pursuant to Section 74-744(b) of the Zoning Resolution to modify the use location requirements for a proposed mixed-use development, on property generally bounded by Bergen Avenue and its northeasterly centerline prolongation, Brook Avenue and East 149th Street Borough of the Bronx, Community Board 1, Council District 17. This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to Charter Section 197-d(b)(2) or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to Charter Section 197-d(b)(3).

Items.MatterName: Planning, LA CENTRAL, Bronx (C 160271 ZSX)
